org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.utils

Class CommonCliOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.utils.CommonCliOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveMetaStore.HiveMetastoreCli

    public class CommonCliOptions
extends Object
    Reusable code for Hive Cli's.

    Basic usage is: create an instance (usually a subclass if you want to all your own options or processing instructions), parse, and then use the resulting information.

    See org.apache.hadoop.hive.service.HiveServer or org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStore for examples of use.
